Conscia is quickly growing its digital footprint in the European market. With our history in acquisitions and our growth in the countries, we need a strong Product Manager to develop our digital offerings for the group and the different markets. 
For more than 10 years Conscia has developed own applications to support the customer experience and as a value-add to our services. We are now looking for a Product Manager that can take the customer experience to the next level and ensure that a Conscia Customer keeps getting that premium feeling that the Conscia brand represents.
 As a Product Manager, you will get direct responsibility for the strategic service delivery platform “Conscia Network Services (CNS)” which is a Contract and Compliance application with a customer facing portal and APIs. In addition, you will be developing the new Conscia portal framework that will consist of several applications and APIs facing the customers.   Your primary goal is to deliver great value to the Conscia Customers. This will be done together with other Product Managers, Product owners and Service Owners to ensure that the digital experience is kept at a very high level supporting the overall value proposition of the Conscia offerings. You will also work closely with the business and our strategic Vendors to develop new services and features that create a differentiating value in the market.
 Tasks will be:

 Portfolio management of the digital services provided to the Conscia Customers
Align the vision for the digital strategy of Conscia Facing Applications
Manage and maintain the strategic Roadmaps for your product area
Commercial planning and activities in collaboration with Marketing
Plan marketing, advertising, and sales strategies with the appropriate departments
Development of new digital Conscia services by analysing Vendor offerings
Budget planning, milestones and business goal attainment
Product launches and training
Customer interactions to support the business and get feedback from the markets
Review, prioritize and adjust product development backlogs and schedules with product owners
Participation in stand-ups, status meetings and driving change advisory board discussions
Applications support and user engagement

 As a Product Manager, we expect that you have:

 5-years experience in Product Management
Knowledge and experience of software development within an Agile team
A customer-focused approach with a good understanding of creating the best customer experience
Social skills to build a social network, and cooperate with customers, partners and suppliers. 
Management and presentation skills to communicate the Conscia vision and product values of the digital offerings across Customers and Conscia Markets.
Ability to challenge discussion partners and influence strategic decision making
Experience in Agile development approach (Scrum, Safe etc.), maybe already holding a Scrum Master certification or similar
Some knowledge of Managed Services, Network Infrastructure, and Security offerings will ease the understanding of the value created from the digital platform and the communication with the business and Customers
Team management skills to ensure productivity and keep employee satisfaction at the high level already existing in Conscia

 Conscia Network Service (CNS)
 Automated Asset Management for even the most complex infrastructures. Award-winning platform helping the Conscia customers in ensuring operational excellence through compliance and service strategy discussions. The portal offers an automatically updated overview of all assets in your network based on automation and scanning. It gets its information from the vendor database, and all units are registered by serial numbers, service levels, address details and other information relevant for successful lifecycle management. Visit: Conscia CNS
 About us
 Conscia is a leading European IT specialist in networking, cyber security, and cloud providing secure infrastructure solutions and 24-7 managed services to clients with complex network, data center, cloud, IOT, and mobility demands. Conscia delivers best-in-class technical competencies and insights, and as a trusted advisor strives to support customers’ business-critical technology systems across the entire life cycle from design, implementation, operation, to optimization.
 Founded in 2003, Conscia today has approximately 900 employees serving some of the largest organizations within financial services, healthcare, public sector, manufacturing, utilities, and retail from offices in Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Germany, Netherlands, and Slovenia. We aim to be the best place to work in Europe for talented IT specialists with deep technical expertise. Visit www.conscia.com

Informatik, Softwareentwicklung, Anwendungsarchitektur, Webanwendungen, IT-Security, Webentwicklung, Agile Methoden, Java, IT
 IT Security Architect (m/f/d) Web 
Application deadline: 08/14/2022 
Wanted as soon as possible for the area of information technology ( IT ) in our headquarters in Frankfurt am Main a IT Security Architect (m/f/d) Web. 
The department " IT -Platform Management Web" with ca. 150 employees*innen - distributed across the locations Frankfurt am Main, Munich, Hanover, Stuttgart and Düsseldorf - supports the departments in the development and support of web applications. The service offering ranges from consulting to selection to implementation around the platform Web. 
Your tasks 
As IT Security Architect (m/f/d) in the area of web you will complement the department " IT -Platform Management Web" and take over the design of the regulations and frameworks specific to the development line Java in the Bundesbank of the IT -security. In doing so, you will define and establish sets of rules for IT -security with regard to organization, processes and technology and develop them further. You will be responsible for planning and implementing the IT cyber/security strategy within the "IT Platform Management Web" department as well as IT security measures and regulations. In addition, you represent the department in committees and WGs on IT security and advise the department management on IT security topics. Furthermore, you will contribute your expertise in supporting the development units within the IT risk management process as well as the implementation of the IT security rules and regulations. 
Your profile 

Accredited Master's degree or equivalent in computer science or science related degree with. IT -focus 
Several years of professional experience and very good knowledge of programming in Java and the design of application architectures and the necessary security measures. 
Very good knowledge of IT -security standards and specifications ( e.g. BSI -Grundschutz) 
Knowledge in methods of structured application analysis 
Strong analytical and conceptual skills, practice-oriented problem-solving skills, ability to deal with conflicts, confident appearance and good negotiation and organizational skills. 
Willingness to continuous training with regard to the security issues of web development. 
Very good command of German and good command of English, both written and spoken 

Our offer 
In addition to responsible tasks in an agile environment, we offer attractive employment conditions such as a permanent and crisis-proof employment with long-term perspective, 30 vacation days, a free job ticket, home office options, up-to-date IT equipment (laptop, smartphone) and remuneration based on the TVöD on the basis of pay group 13 plus a bank allowance. A civil service appointment is possible in principle. An existing civil servant relationship (up to A 15) can be if necessary. be continued. With us, you can expect an extensive range of training, programs for personal development and flexible working hours to design your work-life balance. 
We expect the willingness to undergo a security check in accordance with the Security Check Act ( SÜG ) to undergo. 
Severely disabled people are considered preferentially in case of equal suitability. Part-time employment is generally possible. The Deutsche Bundesbank promotes professional equality between women and men. We therefore particularly welcome applications from women. 
Mr. Marco Rondinella, telephone 069 9566-4012, will be happy to answer any questions you may have about the job advertisement and your application. respectively. 069 9566-34012. contact person for your technical questions is Mr. Thomas Rühlemann, telephone 069 9566-8645. 
We look forward to receiving your online application with the usual documents (cover letter, curriculum vitae, references) by August 14, 2022, quoting the reference number 2022_0663_02.

Brænder du for et salgsjob i IT-branchen? Motiveres du af stærke salg med fokus på gode, langvarige relationer? Og har du en god teknisk forståelse, som du ønsker at bygge videre på i dit næste job? Så kunne du måske blive vores nye Client Manager!
Hos Progressive har vi travlt og byder mange nye kunder velkommen. Vi har derfor brug for en Client Manager, som med tiden kan blive vores kunders værdiskabende sparringspartner og strategiske rådgiver indenfor cloud, outsourcing, sikkerhed & netværk, Microsoft 365 og Servicedesk. Vores kunder er danske erhvervsvirksomheder samt kunder indenfor den offentlige sektor. Er det dig, der bliver Progressives nye Client Manager, kan du glæde dig til at blive en del af en dynamisk, ambitiøs og flad organisation, der lægger vægt på høj faglighed, engagement og kvalitet hele vejen rundt. Vi arbejder hen imod at blive førende på moderne Cloud services i Danmark og her kan du komme ind i billedet.

Hvad skal du lave?
For at understøtte vores spændende vækstrejse har vi brug for dig, elsker at ”sparke dørene ind” hos kunderne og som kan tage ansvaret for den efterfølgende relation mellem vores kunder og leverancen hos Progressive. Din fornemste opgave vil være at skabe et frugtbart fundament, som giver afkast i mersalg og krydssalgsmuligheder. Du vil blive vores kunders daglige ”point of contact” og vil, i tæt samarbejde med kollegaerne i teamet, tage det overordnede ansvar for især nysalg. Med reference til vores CSO vil din hverdag foregå sammen med det øvrige salgsteam og kollegaerne på kontoret i Herlev og typisk indeholde følgende opgaver:

Bidrage til strategiske og taktiske købs- og beslutningsprocesser hos kunden
Udarbejde tilbud i samarbejde med resten af salgsorganisationen
Opbygge salgspipeline og opfylde salgsmål på nysalg, gentegning og omsætning
Udarbejde Account Planer og drive Account Planning-møder og eksekvering
Booking af møder på eksisterende og nye kunder


I perioder vil du også skulle arbejde med udbud og diverse salgskampagner. Stillingen vil stille store krav til dine salgsevner og din evne til at bygge videre på din tekniske viden, og samtidig vil du få rig mulighed for at udvikle dig indenfor komplekst løsningssalg samt tage certificeringer og efteruddannelse. Med stillingen følger en attraktiv gage, pensionsordning, sundhedsordning samt en række personalegoder.

Hvem er du?
Vi forestiller os, at du allerede har et par års erfaring med salg, fx fra it-branchen, telebranchen, elektronik eller lignende, hvor du har opbygget god forståelse for salg og teknik. Der udover drømmer vi om at få en kollega, som:

Elsker nysalg og mødebooking
Har ambitionerne og evnerne til at skabe loyale og tillidsvækkende kundeforhold
Har forretningsforståelse og situationsfornemmelse overfor de mange forskellige typer kunder, du møder i din dagligdag
Arbejder selvstændigt, fleksibelt og trives i en travl hverdag
Har mod på at skulle lære en hel masse om IT-branchen og at skulle arbejde struktureret efter en standardiseret metode
Besidder konkurrencementalitet, humor og er ekstrovert af natur


Derudover er det et stort plus hvis du:

Drømmer om at arbejde i en succesfuld vækstvirksomhed med højt til loftet
Kan identificere dig med Progressives værdier (se vores hjemmeside)


Hvad laver vi her hos Progressive? 
Progressive leverer innovative, sikre og stabile infrastruktur- og driftsløsninger, der understøtter kundernes forretningskritiske IT-systemer. Vi er mange kunders primære IT-partner med særlig fokus på services indenfor Cloud, O365, Servicedesk, Sikkerhed og Netværk. Vores solide IT-kompetencer, gennemprøvede servicekoncepter, effektive processer samt domæneviden gør os til en stærk spiller på markedet. Vi har blandt andet positioneret os stærkt gennem vores gode, personlige relationer til kunderne og vores høje kvalitetsniveau.

Progressive – her vækster vi og har det sjovt samtidigt! 
Hos os kan du forvente en travl, udfordrende og fleksibel arbejdsdag sammen med cirka 100 kollegaer, de fleste på hovedkontoret i Herlev og cirka 20 i Aarhus. Vi oplever stor vækst og der er derfor rig mulighed for at udvikle dine kompetencer gennem arbejdet på mange spændende projekter. Når vi ikke løber stærkt for kunderne og hinanden, tager vi et spil bordfodbold, trækker i sportstøjet (der er mange sjove sportsgrene repræsenteret herinde!) eller nyder kantinens skønne mad. Vi foretager månedlig trivselsmåling for kontinuerligt at sikre en god stemning og glade kollegaer, og vi arbejder aktivt med vores værdier. Hver dag gør vi alle vores til, at kollegaer og kunder trives, og det er derfor vigtigt, at du også har lyst til at være en aktiv medspiller.

Skal du med på holdet?
Så tøv ikke med at sende os dit CV med en kort motivation for jobbet samt evt. relevante bilag via vores karriereportal. Vi vil rigtig gerne have vores nye kollega med ombord så snart som muligt og indkalder løbende til samtale. Har du spørgsmål til stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Hans Christian Eriksen, Chief Sales Officer, på tlf. +45 2270 7282. 

Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig.

Netværkskonsulent
Er du vild med kommunikations- og netværksløsninger og brænder du for at skabe innovative infrastrukturløsninger? Hvis du har den rette erfaring, som kan understøtte en dynamisk virksomhed i rivende udvikling, er du måske vores nye kollega og netværkskonsulent til vores kontor i Herlev.  Hvad skal du lave? For at understøtte vores spændende vækstrejse har vi brug for dig, som kan indgå i samarbejde med kollegaer i Aarhus og Herlev. Som netværkskonsulent kommer du primært til at arbejde med en række projekter indenfor infrastrukturområdet i vores Datacentre og hos en række eksisterende og nye kunder. Du vil få det tekniske ansvar for et antal af vores kunder ligesom du vil få et væsentligt ansvar for udvikling og vedligeholdelse af vores eget Datacenter netværk.  Du vil få en bred berøringsflade og en central og afgørende rolle for, at vi får eksekveret på de mest effektive kunde- og datacenterløsninger.  Hvem er du?
Vi drømmer om en kollega, som:

Har minimum 4 års erfaring som netværkskonsulent
Har en relevant uddannelse med vægt på netværk og IT infrastruktur
Er god til at omsætte forretningsmæssige behov til teknologiske løsninger
Har erfaring med eller potentiale til at indgå i større projekter
Kan arbejde selvstændigt og er dygtig til at navigere blandt mange interessenter
Kan indgå og overholde aftaler og er god til at kommunikere om status og fremdrift 

 Dine tekniske kvalifikationer ligger inden for flere af følgende:

Datacenternetværk
Firewalls gerne indenfor Fortinet 
VPN
High Availability clusters
Routers, switches and sikkerhedsudstyr: 
     
Cisco IOS, Cisco XE, Cisco NX-OS, Junos, F5 BIG-IP, Cisco ASA, Fortinet FortiOS

Routing protokoller som BGP and OSPF
Switching, Spanning tree
NetFlow


 Derudover er det et stort plus hvis du

Er en glad, humoristisk og hjælpsom kollega
Har god forretningsforståelse og evnen til at løse komplekse problemstillinger
Kan identificere dig med vores værdier (se vores hjemmeside)

Hvad laver vi her hos Progressive?  Progressive leverer innovative, sikre og stabile infrastruktur- og driftsløsninger, der understøtter kundernes forretningskritiske IT-systemer. Vi er mange kunders primære IT-partner med særlig fokus på services indenfor Cloud, O365, Servicedesk, Sikkerhed og Netværk. Vores solide IT-kompetencer, gennemprøvede servicekoncepter, effektive processer samt domæneviden gør os til en stærk spiller på markedet. Vi har blandt andet positioneret os stærkt gennem vores gode, personlige relationer til kunderne og vores høje kvalitetsniveau.  Progressive – her vækster vi og har det sjovt samtidigt!  Hos os kan du forvente en travl, udfordrende og fleksibel arbejdsdag sammen med cirka 100 kollegaer, de fleste på hovedkontoret i Herlev og cirka 20 i Aarhus. Vi oplever stor vækst og der er derfor rig mulighed for at udvikle dine kompetencer gennem arbejdet på mange spændende projekter. Når vi ikke løber stærkt for kunderne og hinanden, tager vi et spil bordfodbold, trækker i sportstøjet (der er mange sjove sportsgrene repræsenteret herinde!) eller nyder kantinens skønne mad. Vi foretager månedligt trivselsmåling for kontinuerligt at sikre en god stemning og glade kollegaer, og vi arbejder aktivt med vores værdier. Hver dag gør vi alle vores til, at kollegaer og kunder trives, og det er derfor vigtigt, at du også har lyst til at være en aktiv medspiller.   Skal du med på holdet? Så tøv ikke med at sende os dit CV med en kort motivation for jobbet samt evt. relevante bilag via vores karriereportal. Vi vil rigtig gerne have vores nye kollega med ombord så snart som muligt og indkalder løbende til samtale. Vi fjerner stillingsopslaget, når den rette kandidat er fundet og opfordrer derfor til at søge stillingen hurtigst muligt. Har du spørgsmål til stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Bent Lytsen, COO på tlf. +45 3055 6088.   Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig. 



Bliv en del af Danmarks mest ambitiøse IT-virksomhed
Vi tilbyder en spændende og alsidig arbejdsplads med gode muligheder for både personlig og faglig udvikling. Vi er en organisation i vækst og med høje ambitioner, som beskæftiger flere end 750 medarbejdere fordelt på 7 lokationer i Danmark.
Hos os fungerer alle medarbejdere optimalt i rollen som Hverdagens IT Superhelte. Omdrejningspunktet for vores arbejde er, hvordan vi kan optimere kundernes forretning med IT. Vi er specialister i IT-strategi, -hosting, -sikkerhed, -support og -udvikling.
itm8 IT Relation er en del af itm8, som er en førende dansk leverandør af IT-services til den private og offentlige sektor. Vi er repræsenteret på en række lokationer i Danmark, Sverige, Filippinerne og Tjekkiet.
Koncernen har en stærk markedsposition i Danmark inden for fire forretningsområder; Cloud Services, Digital Solutions, Professional Services og Cyber Security Services. Ligeledes beskæftiger koncernen mere end 1.100 medarbejdere med aktiviteter i 10 individuelle og unikke virksomheder, der alle fokuserer på samarbejde, innovation, udvikling og værdiskabelse på tværs af porteføljen. De 10 virksomheder er IT Relation, Mentor IT, Sotea, Improsec, Miracle42, Emineo, Copenhagen Software, Progressive, Cloud Teams og Me'ning.
Et helt særligt fællesskab

Hos IT Relation har vi stor fokus på at styrke det sociale sammenhold i virksomheden. Vi har en dygtig personaleforening, som hvert år arrangerer diverse firmaarrangementer - både i vores egne lokaler og ude af huset. Det kan være alt lige fra koncerter og sportsarrangementer til temafester og julehygge, hvor medarbejdernes familier også er inviterede.

En sund hverdag

Vi er en virksomhed med fokus på sundhed og trivsel. Hvert år deltager vi blandt andet i diverse motionsarrangementer, som for eksempel DHL-Stafetten.   Vores sundhedspolitik går også igen i den kantineordning, som vi tilbyder ansatte. Vi har tilknyttet vores eget kokketeam, som hver dag laver lækre sunde retter. Herudover tilbyder vi en række øvrige personalegoder, såsom massage, betalt telefon, arbejdstøj samt en gunstig pensionsordning og sundhedsforsikring. 






   Såfremt du har spørgsmål, er du velkommen til at kontakte 
   
Bent Lytsen

COO
 bnl@progressive.dk
     Tlf.: 30556088
    



Ansøgningsfrist:
 Snarest muligt 
  

Arbejdssted: Herlev

Trives du i krydsfeltet mellem os som hosting leverandør, teknologi og kunder? Og har du faglig ballast og dyb teknisk viden indenfor IT-infrastruktur? Så vil vi rigtig gerne høre fra dig!
Hos Progressive har vi travlt og byder mange nye kunder velkommen. Vi har derfor brug for flere Cloud Infrastruktur Konsulenter, som kan deltage i implementeringen, driften og vedligeholdelsen af udvalgte infrastrukturløsninger. Er det dig, der bliver Progressives nye Infrastrukturkonsulent, kan du glæde dig til at blive en del af en dynamisk, ambitiøs og flad organisation, der lægger vægt på høj faglighed, engagement og kvalitet hele vejen rundt. Vi arbejder hen imod at blive førende på moderne Cloud services i Danmark og her kan du komme ind i billedet!
Hvad skal du lave?
For at understøtte vores spændende vækstrejse har vi brug for dig, som kan rådgive kunderne i forhold til valg af den rette infrastrukturløsning. Din fornemste opgave vil være at sikre, at vores kunders infrastrukturløsninger er de mest optimale og tæt kundedialog vil også være en del af jobbet. Med reference til vores konsulentdirektør i Vest vil du blive en del af et team i vækst og have mulighed for at sparre med ledelsen, kollegaerne og kunderne. Din hverdag vil foregå sammen med kollegaerne på kontoret i Aarhus og du vil typisk arbejde med opgaver indenfor:

Drift og vedligehold af udvalgte løsninger indenfor public eller hybrid cloud
Opsætning og drift, design og arkitektur

Du få rig mulighed for at udvikle dig indenfor public cloud og løbende modtage certificeringer og efteruddannelse.

Hvem er du?
Vi drømmer om at få en kollega, som:

Har relevant erfaring og uddannelse indenfor IT
Er vant til at begå sig i CLI
Har god forståelse for systemer og sammenhængen deri (Eksempel: Load balancer + webserver + SQL)
Har godt kendskab til shellscripting
Er skarp på problemløsning (debugging)
Arbejder selvstændigt og kan jonglere mellem flere opgaver og interessenter
Arbejder selvstændigt og trives i samspillet med mange interessenter
Er flydende på dansk og engelsk – både skrift og tale

Vi forventer vores nye konsulent har: 

God erfaring med Hyper-V / VMware virtualisering
God erfaring med Veeam Backup
God erfaring med Windows servere
Erfaring eller kendskab til Azure løsninger
Erfaring eller kendskab til O365 
Erfaring eller kendskab til SCCM / WSUS
Er en glad, humoristisk og hjælpsom kollega
Har god forretningsforståelse og evnen til at løse komplekse problemstillinger
Kan identificere dig med vores værdier (se vores hjemmeside)

Progressive leverer innovative, sikre og stabile infrastruktur- og driftsløsninger, der understøtter kundernes forretningskritiske IT-systemer. Vi er mange kunders primære IT-partner med særlig fokus på services indenfor Cloud, O365, Servicedesk, Sikkerhed og netværk. Vi foretager ugentlig en ”puls-måling” for kontinuerligt at sikre en god stemning og glade kollegaer og vi arbejder aktivt med vores værdier. Hver dag gør vi alle vores til, at kollegaer og kunder trives og det er derfor vigtigt, at du også har lyst til at være en aktiv medspiller.

Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig.

job_title: Cyber security specialist til Risk & Compliance
job_summary:
Har du interesse for eller erfaring med cyber security, og kunne du tænke dig at sætte dine kompetencer i spil i en afdeling af dygtige sikkerhedsspecialister?
Vi har lagt et solidt fundament for sikkerhedsområdet i Andel, som nu bare venter på, at du hjælper med den videre udvikling.
“Du får virkelig mulighed for at byde ind, forme din rolle og komme ind på det tidspunkt, hvor vi forventer at udvide vores team betydeligt. Har du viden og drive, kan du være med, når vi træffer de vigtige beslutninger,” forklarer head of Risk & Compliance, Nina Stender.
IT-sikkerhed – et team af specialister 
I IT-sikkerhed er vi sammen 6 sikkerhedsspecialister, som har ansvaret for udarbejdelse og vedligeholdelse af Andels risikovurderinger og -processer. Sammen ser vi ind i en større udvikling, hvor vi på sigt forventer at fordoble vores antal af kolleger.
Vores fornemste opgave er at agere betroet sikkerhedspartner til resten af organisationen. Det indebærer, at vi håndterer de sikkerhedsudfordringer, som vores kolleger møder i deres dagligdag. Her finder vi de allerbedste løsninger, der øger sikkerheden og minimerer risici.
Du sikrer compliance på vores sikkerhedsprocesser 
I din hverdag vil du få et tæt samarbejde med stakeholders på tværs af hele organisationen omkring identificering, håndtering og mitigering af sikkerhedsrisici på IT-systemer og processer.
Helt specifikt får du fokus på security governance, sikkerhedspolitikker og -undtagelser samt at øge opmærksomheden omkring cyber security hos dine kolleger. Det betyder, at du:

rådgiver dine kolleger i, hvordan risici bliver mitigeret


arbejder med processer i relation til ISO27001/02 og IEC62443


er ansvarlig for vores ISMS-system


driver og udvikler vores compliance-setup


udvikler awareness-kampagner og skriver artikler til vores intranet.

Vi kombinerer formål, faglighed og fællesskab 
Andel er en arbejdsplads i transition – og til trods for store tanker og et blik, der er fast rettet mod den grønne omstilling, så er vi helt nede på jorden. For energi er ikke blot noget, vi producerer. Du vil derfor hurtigt mærke vores store engagement og den helt særlige energi, der driver os på tværs af alle faggrupper og selskaber.
Desuden tager vi os godt af vores kolleger og har fokus på din personlige og faglige udvikling. Du deltager derfor både i introkurser og får relevant videreuddannelse. Herudover får du en attraktiv lønpakke, forsikringsordning, fleksible arbejdstider, betalt mobiltelefon og internetadgang, adgang til motionsrum samt mulighed for en APV-godkendt hjemmearbejdsplads.
Kendskab til og gerne erfaring med cyber security 
Som person er du god til at kommunikere på tværs af faggrupper, så du kan nå bredt ud til kolleger i organisationen og samtidig sætte dig ind i dine kollegers hverdag og sikkerhedsudfordringer. Desuden er du nysgerrig på at lære forretningen at kende for at kunne skabe dig et helhedsoverblik over sikkerhedssituationen.
Og så er du ikke bleg for at sætte dig ind i nye tiltag og områder, når vi udvikler vores sikkerhedsområde yderligere. Vi forestiller os, at du:

har minimum en BA inden for IT kombineret med interesse for og helst erfaring med cyber security


gerne har kendskab til ISO 27001/2 samt NIS2


måske har kendskab til energiområdet


taler og skriver flydende dansk og engelsk


kan sikkerhedsgodkendes hos PET.

Becoming Andel – vil du med på rejsen? 
Hvis det lyder som noget for dig, så send din ansøgning og dit CV via hurtigst muligt. Hvis du har spørgsmål, er du velkommen til at kontakte head of Risk & Compliance, Nina Stender på 20 12 71 71.
Vi holder samtaler løbende og ansætter, når vi har fundet den rette kandidat.
Vi glæder os til at høre fra dig!

Vil du være en del af et fleksibelt og internationalt team, der driver cyber- og informationssikkerhed inden for MAN Energy Solutions? Vi er i øjeblikket ved at styrke teamet for at muliggøre virksomhedens digitale transformation. Vi søger en kollega, der vil hjælpe os med at forme sikkerhedskøreplanen.
Hvad skal jeg gøre? Når du bliver vores nye kollega, vil du spille en vigtig rolle i sikringen af MAN Energy Solutions mod cybertrusler. Vi er en global virksomhed, der arbejder med kunder og andre interessenter fra hele verden, og derfor er det af største vigtighed at sikre os selv.
Som specialist i informationssikkerhed hos os skal du blandt andet udvikle og implementere koncepter og retningslinjer for informationssikkerhed, herunder awarenessaktiviteter. Derudover skal du støtte informationsklassificering i forretningsområder og bidrage til at definere sikre løsninger på forretningskrav. Det betyder også, at du hjælper kolleger med at forbedre it-sikkerheden på deres område, samtidig med at du håndterer informationssikkerhedshændelser, når de opstår.
For hele tiden at have et tilfredsstillende sikkerhedsniveau, vil du også løbende arbejde på at forbedre de nuværende processer og værktøjer til it-sikkerhed samt foretage revisionsmæssige vurderinger af informationssikkerhed og it-sikkerhed.
Hvem er jeg? Da du vil arbejde i en rolle, hvor samarbejde på tværs af organisationen er afgørende for jobbet, kan du lide at tage initiativ og drive sikkerhedsopgaver. Det betyder, at du skal interagere med mange forskellige interessenter i vores organisation, og du kommunikerer nemt med ikke-eksperter på området og med folk uanset deres organisatoriske placering i virksomheden.
Du bliver en del af en international organisation, og du vil have kolleger i flere lande. Tidligere erfaring med at arbejde internationalt vil derfor være en stor fordel.
På et mere fagligt plan forestiller vi os, at du:

har afsluttet en uddannelse inden for datalogi eller tilsvarende kvalifikationer
har praktisk erfaring med it-sikkerhed
Taler og skriver flydende engelsk

Hvordan er mit nye hold? Cyber- og informationssikkerhedsteamet er placeret i Augsburg, København og Aurangabad; kulturen er baseret på en agil tankegang med særlig fokus på gennemsigtighed, samarbejde og løbende læring.
Hvad kan du tilbyde mig? MAN Energy Solutions tilbyder en konkurrencedygtig lønpakke og en pensionsordning. Derudover har vi en række andre personalegoder, som bl.a. omfatter:

Stor fleksibilitet, så dit arbejds- og privatliv kan passe sammen
Forsikring mod kritisk sygdom, adgang til fysioterapi osv.
Massageordning
God kantine
Et væld af medarbejderklubber og foreninger, der dækker alt fra sport til kunst
Rabatklubber
Gratis parkering

Hvordan ansøger jeg? Hvis du synes, at jobbet lyder interessant, vil vi meget gerne høre fra dig! Ansøg jobbet via vores hjemmeside ved at klikke på "Ansøg stillingen" og vedlæg CV, ansøgningsbrev og andre relevante dokumenter. Vi afholder samtaler i løbet af ansøgningsperioden. Hvis du har spørgsmål, er du velkommen til at kontakte Elena Furini, Chief Information Security Officer, pr. telefon på +45 29 26 97 63. Du kan finde flere oplysninger om virksomheden på www.man-es.com.
Hvem er MAN Energy Solutions? MAN Energy Solutions har hovedkvarter i Tyskland og beskæftiger omkring 15.000 medarbejdere på verdensplan. Heraf er vi ca. 2.200 passionerede medarbejdere i Danmark fordelt på tre lokationer: København, Frederikshavn og Holeby. Det er meget vigtigt at værdsætte og pleje de ting, der virkelig er vigtige for os i den danske organisation af MAN Energy Solutions. Derfor har vi identificeret fem elementer i vores Core Story, som er lige så vigtige for at forberede vores virksomhed på fremtiden: Vi har et kommercielt mindset, vi er first movers inden for innovation, vi har en unik mulighed og ansvar for at reducere emissioner, vi er i en transformationsproces mod digitalisering som vores forretnings unikke salgsargument, og vi er en progressiv arbejdsplads, der fokuserer på fleksibilitet og samarbejde. Med mere end 250 års erfaring inden for avanceret teknik leverer vi en unik portefølje af teknologier og muligheder inden for udvikling af motorer til brug på skibe og i kraftværker over hele verden. Vi udvikler topmoderne agterskibssystemer, herunder CP- og FP-propeller og fjernstyringssystemer. Ifølge 2-taktsområdet er vi uden sammenligning verdens førende videnscenter. MAN Energy Solutions arbejder ud fra mottoet "Future in The Making", fordi vi gør en dyd ud af at skabe bæredygtige løsninger og bidrager til en CO2-neutral økonomi.

About Improsec:  We are Improsec. Our company name is a contraction of what we do – we improve security.
As a fully independent Cyber Security advisory company we take active responsibility in improving the security level of financial institutions, utility companies, public organizations, IT companies, and other medium to large sized private companies.
We are a dedicated team of 35+ employees, known to be knowledge-intensive, competent, and respected in our field. We are characterized by solid technical skills and an energetic and strong social working environment. Our commitment to providing the highest quality knowledge, experience, and both strategic and deep technical expertise is what allows us to create a SAFER and BETTER future together with our clients.

About the job: As our new Security Advisor, you will work independently with companies and organizations at a high professional and technical level.
You will have a high degree of freedom to influence your daily work and projects and to influence the development of the company.
You will be part of a dynamic team of talented people with a great passion for Cyber Security within Red Teaming, Blue Teaming, and enterprise infrastructure/application hardening. 
 Responsibilities:  As a security professional you will have three primary responsibilities:

Providing a wide variety of clients with high-quality consultancy advice and support.
Perform Red Team, Purple Team, and Adversary Simulation at a high technical level.
Perform Assumed Breach, Penetration Testing, Testing arbitrary services, and Web Application tests at a high technical level.


When it comes to generating leads, day-to-day duties typically include:

Generating client assessments, feedback, reports, and certificates within service level agreement targets. 
Working independently with companies and organizations at a high professional and technical level. 
Red Teaming, Adversary Simulation, and Penetration Testing.
Representing Improsec at customer locations.


Skills we can’t do without:

Full working proficiency in English.
You have a solid understanding of Red Teaming and Adversary Simulation.
You have experience within the role as Red Team Test Manager in TIBER engagements.

Skills we’d like:

Full working proficiency in Danish.
You are familiar with threat intelligence-based adversary simulation using other frameworks than TIBER.
You are familiar with development of offensive security tooling and SDLC.
You are familiar with developing applications in C#, C++, Go or Nim


  More reasons to join us: Our culture is strong and unique, and we value a healthy and social work environment – you will work 37 hours/week. You will have a significant personal budget for training, courses, certifications, and/or conferences.
You will get to work with enterprise clients on interesting projects together with your awesome technical colleagues and have the opportunity to explore and develop your interests in weekly Nerd Club meetings after hours, or monthly Nerd Days during office hours. 
Curious to know more? If you have questions to the position, feel free to contact contact Director of Technical Cyber Risk Advisory, Thomas Wong at two@improsec.com or (+45) 9310 6032
Application Send your motivated application with resume and diplomas in .pdf-format to info@improsec.com. We take in candidates for interviews on a running basis. As we work with cyber security, it is a requirement that you can show, and uphold a clean criminal record.

Herudover tilbyder vi en række øvrige personalegoder, såsom massage, betalt telefon, arbejdstøj samt en gunstig pensionsordning og sundhedsforsikring.

Ser du dig selv som en detaljeorienteret, proaktiv og omstillingsparat regnskabsassistent, der motiveres af at arbejde i en selvstændig position i en regnskabsafdeling, hvor der både er højt til loftet, udfordrende opgaver og gode kollegaer? Så er det dig, vi søger, til vores regnskabsafdeling i Miracle 42. 
Miracle 42 har 100 ansatte og er førende leverandør af professionelle IT-ydelser inden for it-udvikling, drift, hosting og test. Regnskabsafdelingen består ud over dig af to kollegaer med hver sit ansvarsområde. Du vil hos os få interessante arbejdsopgaver og fleksibel arbejdstid med frihed under ansvar og muligheden for at planlægge din egen arbejdsdag. 
Arbejdsopgaverne vil være allround bogholderi, men til en start primært med fokus på håndtering af kreditorer, herunder at sende kreditorfaktura i flow, kontere og bogføre mv. Herud over vi du være ansvarlig for udlægshåndtering og du må forvente at enkelte administrative opgaver kan forekomme. 
Hvad gør dig til et godt match i denne rolle?  Da vi er et mindre team, er det vigtigt, at du er en god teamplayer, serviceminded, tager ansvar og arbejder engageret. Du behøver ikke have mange års erfaring, men du skal have en grundlæggende forståelse for bogholderi, samt du taler og skriver dansk og engelsk flydende. 
Vi ser gerne, at du har erfaring med: 

Kreditorbogholderi, bogføring og afstemning 
Navision, Business Central eller lignende ERP-system 
Officepakken 

Er du vores nye kollega?  Har du spørgsmål til stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte Talent Acquisition Specialist, telefon 6120 0556. 
Vi inviterer løbende kandidater til samtale, så søg stillingen hurtigst muligt. 
Der indhentes straffeattest forud for ansættelse.

Vi er repræsenteret på en række lokationer i Danmark, Sverige, Filippinerne og Tjekkiet. Koncernen har en stærk markedsposition i Danmark inden for fire forretningsområder; Cloud Services, Digital Solutions, Professional Services og Cyber Security Services. Ligeledes beskæftiger koncernen mere end 1.100 medarbejdere med aktiviteter i 10 individuelle og unikke virksomheder, der alle fokuserer på samarbejde, innovation, udvikling og værdiskabelse på tværs af porteføljen. Are you interested in becoming the leader of an experienced team in the IT Global Operations Centre in Prague? Do you have experience in managing and motivating a team and an IT technical background? If so, apply now. We are looking for a team leader to manage our team in Prague and provide effective leadership. 
About the job As Team Leader You will be responsible for the day to day supervision, management and motivation of team members. As a Team Leader you will be the point of contact for all team members, so your communication skills should be excellent. You should also be able to act proactively to ensure the smooth running of the team and effective collaboration.

 Your responsibilities:

Create an inspiring team environment with an open communication culture 
Set clear team goals 
Responsible for ticket and incident are handled by queue coordinator 
Coordination and planning of tasks between the Operations Team and other teams 
Ensure team adhere to management prioritization and our way of working 
Drive the team continuously, working towards set objectives and initiatives 
Assess stability, security, and scalability of Windows systems 
Work to SLA thresholds for incident(s), request(s) and problem(s) 
Create, manage, and evolve polices, processes and procedures 
Contribute on continuous improvement of our services & way of working 
Keep up to date with advancements in technology 
Individual interviews with employees 
Talk about salary and education 

 About our Global Operations Centre Our Global Operations Centre is the entry point for customer technical enquiries. Inquiries come in via phone, email, monitoring and web portal. Together with several other tech teams in Aarhus, Herning, Copenhagen, Prague, and the Philippines, we take care of the customer-facing functions as well as the primary server operations. We are the customers' primary point of contact for systems operations. We focus on high service and stable operation, and we ensure this by proactive monitoring of customers' systems. Besides our normal operation tasks, we are also an important part of our security operations where we proactive look at potential vulnerability.

 The Global Operations Centre is a dynamic, fresh, and experienced team used to communicating and operating in a challenging environment with high responsibility for many servers, processes, and customers. The team supports our customers 24/7, so you should expect alternating work hours (day, evening, night, and weekends).
What do you bring? We expect you to have an IT technical background combined with experience in both management and coordination, perhaps you have been a project manager on smaller projects. 

Have 5+ years of experience in IT infrastructure 
Have experience in personnel management 
Are structured and exhibit a follow-up and proactive style 
Are able to keep track in a hectic environment where priorities and assessments are constantly needed 
Have good communication and interpersonal skills 
Are positive and open-minded and good at building relationships with colleagues and partners
With your professional approach, you will motivate and develop your staff while maintaining high uptime of the IT platform.


 Employee benefits

5 weeks of holidays 
5 sick days/year 
Flexible working hours 
Hybrid working model 
iPhone and Lenovo laptop 
Cafeteria flexible spending account (18.000 CZK/year) 
Meal vouchers in amount of 100 CZK/voucher (55 CZK is covered by employer) 
Monthly pension insurance of 3% 
Possibility to arrange a Multisport card (as a part of Cafeteria)
Company assistance towards TAX authorities 
Czech, English and Danish lessons paid by company
Support in your professional and personal growth 
Socializing events (company parties, team events, Friday's breakfast...) 
Fresh fruits and vegetables, delicious coffee and tea and soft drinks 
Height adjustable tables 
Pool table, darts, PlayStation 4 Pro and relax zone

Are you ready for a fun and rewarding opportunity in an awesome company? Join us in leading the fight against cybercrime!

 At Heimdal Security we protect users and companies from cyber-criminal actions, by keeping critical information and intellectual property safe. We're one of the most ambitious and fastest growing companies in the cybersecurity industry, and our product palette has phenomenal market fit for land purposes.


 We have been praised by the FBI and winners of multiple awards, most recently the “AI and Machine Learning based Security Solution of the Year” at the Computing Security Awards and “Cloud Delivered Security Solution of the Year” at the Network Computing Awards.


 We are leading the fight against cybercrime, developing new technologies and providing intelligence to protect over 10,000 companies against cybercriminal attacks and data security breaches.

 The Role 
As the Customer Success Manager, you will be responsible for managing customers, securing customer renewals, and closing expansion opportunities. You will work in close cooperation with sales leadership to improve retention, minimize churn risk, and drive additional growth. You will have a consistent track record of success renewing Cloud subscription licensing, with growth, and in building beneficial, positive relationships with customers, the broader account management team, and channel partners.


 This position carries a sales quota. The position will be based in Copenhagen, Denmark as part of our global CSM team.

 Your day-to-day 

Manage current customers and carry an individual bookings target.
Meet/exceed assigned expansion and renewal rate/ retention targets.
Working on a long-term cycle to identify renewal risk, and partner on remedial actions aimed at securing an on-time renewal.
Identify expansion opportunities to generate additional revenue (upsell/cross-sell), driving those opportunities to closure and/or ensuring that the appropriate account management resources are engaged to maximize the opportunity.
Maintain accurate account, license, service contract, asset and entitlement records within salesforce.com and ongoing customer interaction.
Manage renewals from opportunity to invoice, understanding pricing and contractual obligations.
Predictable Forecasting - Demonstrated success in predictably and consistently delivering monthly and quarterly forecast through strong opportunity management.
Pro-actively identifying issues that may impact a renewal, and engaging all available resources to resolve.
Collaborates cross-functionally to ensure adoption and lifetime value by aligning solutions to high priority customer initiatives, adoption, value realization, and ultimately high customer satisfaction



 Attributes

A self-starter with the ability to work independently or in a team environment.
Excellent interpersonal skills with a flair for building strong relationships
Excellent communication skills; verbal and written
Excellent organizational skills with the ability to prioritize tasks, take initiative and work proactively with minimal supervision. 
Has a team mentality. Willing to grow and help other teammates grow by offering and accepting wisdom, feedback and help when needed.
Ability to work within a fast-paced environment, with high adaptability and positive attitude.
Being a firm believer in the math of sales, knowing success is a combination of hard work, strong priorities, and high quality



What you bring to the team

Sales or Renewals experience with Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS), Infrastructure-as-a-Service (IaaS), Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), and data /analytics across a diverse customer base with a demonstrated ability to meet or exceed a sales target for retention and/or growth.
C-level poised, confident executive presence and polish, and excellent listening skills.
Manage accounts by building and developing client relationships through personalized contact, understanding of client’s needs, probing for expanded opportunity and use cases and ability to communicate solution values of products & services
Have a strong product understanding, system knowledge and processes to manage a pipeline of opportunity.
Deep understanding of the security and threat vendor landscape.
Must be a self-starter with the ability to work independently or in a team environment.
Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent preferred, but not essential.
Fluent in Danish and English; written and verbal.



 What we offer

We value your personal and professional growth and with us you have many opportunities to grow in your career, as a person, and within a team. We have frequent performance reviews, possibility to receive peer feedback, progression paths, etc. to support you and your development.
International work environment in fast-growing company
Fun work environment and team get-togethers and events
An attractive commission model
Benefits such as company-paid days off in addition to vacation/annual leave.



 Our Mission We are leading the fight against cybercrime and protecting the operational integrity of all midmarket and lower enterprise companies.

 Our Culture We believe in hiring the best and the brightest while cultivating a culture of collaboration and execution. We are Dedicated, Innovative, and Humble. As in devoted and passionate about our work and what we do. We seek to optimize, improve every day, and challenge status quo. We are open-minded to new ideas and to feedback, and we know success comes from hard work.

 We are committed to constantly create an environment where each individual has the opportunity to grow, personally and professionally. We have a strong sense of unity and togetherness and know we are stronger together, and having fun together is a key element at Heimdal.

 We are an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. All employment decisions are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to gender, race, color, disability, religion, marital status, family or parental status.

Summary 

 Business Information Security Officers (BISOs) serve in a client-centric role supporting the Sitel Group and exist to promote client satisfaction as part of the Global Security organization under the Business Information Security Office (BISO). 
 
 Working with global enterprise clients, BISOs collaborate with the IT solutions team, business development and deal desk to ensure comprehensive security design in a pre-sales environment. 
 
 The BISO is a critical resource to the legal team serving as the security subject matter expert on contractual language. 
 
 The BISO partners with Cyber Security Engineering, Cyber Security Operations, and Project Management Office (including Enterprise Change Management (ECM)) to oversee security matters during client implementations and changes. 
 
 The BISO serves as an internal resource to the Operations team to support client security audits, client change requests, and other security related topics pertaining to Sitel's clients.
 
 The regional role will oversee the security of sensitive information and projects, client or corporate related, and will advise in the security of the company's infrastructure to meet client requirements.
 

Primary responsibilities


The Analyst role will work under the direction of the Regional BISO or the BISO Manager to oversee the security of sensitive information and projects, client or corporate related, and will advise in the security of the company's infrastructure to meet client requirements
Assist in conducting IT security risk assessments, reviews, investigations and risk management services throughout the company
Under supervision of the Manager or Director, Regional BISO, provide security risk evaluation, audits, mitigation and solutions to projects and initiatives advocating security measures in line with contractual obligations and internal security policies
Assist in the development and implementation of strategies to balance security recommendation with business needs
Respond to inquiries and requests on security related questions from solutions providers, developers, engineers, and leadership team
Work with IT to ensure assets are adequately secured to clients' requirements
Conduct and support physical security planning, reviews, audits and operations
Provide Tier 2 support to our internal security, operations and other staff in the identification, investigation and mitigation of fraudulent and other prohibited activities, geolocation violations, DLP alerts
Provide support to operations and account teams to remediate missed SLAs for security awareness, termination of accounts
Provide security input to Enterprise Change Management team to facilitate client requested changes
Provide support to the regional team to gather audit evidence and provide follow-up responses to client security audit activities or internal security audit activities
Respond to and work security tickets as assigned to the regional BISO team
Perform case management and execution of support for security investigations under the direction of the Regional BISO or the BISO Manager
Participation and engagement in Sitel Regional Security initiatives, including but not limited to Site Security Questionnaire (SSQ) support, reviewing geolocation violations and data loss prevention (DLP) violations, ensuring that recommendations are made to meet the needs of Sitel clients and the business


 Knowledge, Abilities, Skills and Competences 

 The BISO must respond and collaborate with internal partners and clients in a timely manner across international time zones. In addition to English, there is strong preference for a candidate that can bring language capabilities of the region he or she would support. Candidates must have backgrounds in network and/or server planning and design, implementation, and operations, with additional focus on one of more areas of security design. The BISO will apply business and technology skills with structured methodologies to deliver solutions to the customer, conduct solution demonstrations and technical presentations. 
 

Knowledge/Abilities


Knowledge and experience in Information Security best practices (technical knowledge and demonstrated technical expertise)
Working knowledge of Common Security Frameworks (ISO 27000 series, SSAE 18, NIST SP 800 series, etc)
Working knowledge of Privacy Frameworks (GDPR, HIPAA, PIPEDA, etc)
Working knowledge of Payment Card Industry (PCI) framework and controls
Other industry and country security requirements as required to support clients in the region supported
Ability to appropriately handle critical information and sensitive information
Effectively use Microsoft Office products, including Visio, in communication delivery
Effective organization and communications skills


 Independent Decision Making Skills


Self-motivated, directed and well-organized capable of working in a complex security environment with multiple local and international security requirements 
Ability to contribute security and apply security principles into the design of client IT solutions
Review and contribute security expertise to client requested changes in the Enterprise Change Management process
Input into enterprise security design based on client changes or requirements
Input into other areas of security as client requirements evolve


 Security Analyst BISO

Your Impact & Responsibilities
 The Territory Account Manager is mainly desk based, direct quota carrying role which owns existing and/or named prospect accounts in the territory market segment (mid sized organizations >500 employees). The Territory Manager is responsible from prospecting to closing out opportunities in partnership with or and through our channel partners. Deal size between $20k-$150k and a defined list of approximately 150 accounts.


 Performance Objectives

Achieve and exceed quota for assigned territory. Upsell into existing accounts and/or win new customers
Proactively prospect to find new contacts and opportunities by leveraging search engines, LinkedIn, social media, business indexes
Excellent cold calling skills
Work closely with channel partners in a set territory to drive marketing and sales activity
Articulate clearly Check Point’s value proposition and solutions to help prospect achieve their cyber security needs
Qualify the needs of new business prospects by understanding security environment, challenges, timelines and budget
Achieve high sales activities on daily and weekly basis
Timely follow up on leads and deal registrations
Conduct virtual demos and meetings
Generate 4X qualified pipeline to quota for conversion into revenue
Manage and maintain accurate account and opportunity details in Salesforce
Provide accurate quarterly, monthly, and weekly forecast on deals



Your Knowledge & Skills

More than 3+ years Inside Sales or Field Sales experience in the IT Industry
Preferably with a Cyber security background
Results driven and self-starter
Hunting sales mentality and passionate about setting and achieving goals
Experience with pre-call planning, opportunity qualification, and objection handling
High integrity and a team-first mentality
Positive and upbeat phone skills, excellent listening skills, and strong writing skills
Strong proficiency with Excel, Word and Microsoft Outlook. Experience with Salesforce preferred
The ability to interact professionally and reliably with senior level executives within and outside the company, as well as with customers, vendors etc.
Enthusiastic and outgoing personality
Strong sense of urgency and efficiency in completing work
Ability to take self-initiative, be proactive and ability to multitask, prioritize workload
Exemplary verbal and written English communication skills
Attention to detail

Are you ready to help Terma securing people through advanced technologies? 
At Terma, we are currently looking for a Senior Security Architect to lead our internal cyber security effort across Group IT. 
We believe that security – the protection of human lives, of countries, and sovereignty – leads to a safer, more prosperous, and ultimately more sustainable future. This is what drives us to deliver mission-critical solutions for our partners, customers, and end-users around the world. Security is also a key word in our internal ways of working, and with this newly established position as senior security architect we aim to achieve greater emphasis on security and how it can present both possibilities and new ways of working, when working with related requirements and best practices. 
 Your main role and responsibilities  The Security Architect (SA) is a critical member of Group IT and will refer to our Director of IT Operations.  Your main role is to act as an interface between our IT Operations and the strategic and process-based requirements and activities across the entire business. This will be achieved in a close collaboration with our Security department and other central stakeholders in our TECH division and across the business. You will also be responsible for working with business and IT stakeholders to balance real-world risks with business drivers such as speed, agility, flexibility, and performance.
The primary tasks will be to: 

Translate the IT-risk requirements and constraints of the business into technical control requirements and specifications
Develop our future security roadmap 
Coordinate the IT organization's technical activities to implement and manage security infrastructure that is aligned with our executive management’s high security requirements and the expectations of our customers. 
Act as an empowered authority on the subject of security and ensure that security measures are incorporated into strategic IT plans.


 Desired skills and experiences  The SA is a technical leadership role that requires a strong technical background, as well as an ability to work with both the IT organization and business management to align priorities to achieve key business objectives.  Expertise in executing projects is essential for success in this role, and you must be able to prioritize your work efforts — balancing a degree of operational tasks with longer-term strategic security efforts. 
As you will be responsible for managing a highly technical area, you must have excellent skills within technical leadership and stakeholder management, in order accomplish company development goals and keep cyber security on the agenda. 
 Professional qualifications

You have a relevant education i.e., a bachelor's degree or similar in information systems, an IT/business degree or equivalent work experience. 
Solid IT experience with similar tasks e.g., in an information security role or working with security procedures, audit management or other process-related work. 
Relevant Security Certifications such as: 
   
ISO 27001
ITIL 
NIST 

Analytical and critical thinking skills, and the ability to identify needs and take initiative are key requirements of the SA's position.


 What can Terma offer In Terma it is your skills, commitment and ambitions that help us fulfil our mission. We offer a job within an area that holds considerable attention within the organization and where you will find great opportunities to shape your own working environment. 
You will be part of a company with an exciting future and considerable growth where you will have the opportunity to shape the company’s cyber security setup and define the future security roadmap, which protects the entirety of Terma.
Our company culture is autonomous and engaging, and we acknowledge the importance of flexibility in a great working environment. 
 Any unanswered questions? For further information, please do not hesitate to contact Director IT Operations Casper Stenbroen via phone: + 45 2371 1719 or e-mail: CASB@terma.com.
If the position has sparked your interest, just send us your motivated CV as soon as possible, and we will get back to you. To ensure that your CV will reach us and is properly processed, we only receive applications via www.terma.com.
Applications will be processed continuously.
Bear in mind that candidates for this position must be able to obtain a security clearance by the Danish Defence Intelligence Service. This entails that candidates, as a minimum, have stayed within NATO/EU for the last 7 years only interrupted by short stays abroad.




The high-tech and innovative Terma Group develops products and systems for defense, non-defense and security applications, including command and control systems, radar systems, self-protection systems for aircraft and vessels, space technology, and aerostructures for the aircraft industry. 

Terma A/S is headquartered at Aarhus, Denmark. Internationally, Terma has subsidiaries and operations in The Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, United Kingdom, United Arab Emirates, India, Singapore and the U.S.

About Improsec: We are Improsec. Our company name is a contraction of what we do – we improve security.
As a fully independent Cyber Security advisory company we take active responsibility in improving the security level of financial institutions, utility companies, public organizations, IT companies, and other medium to large sized private companies.
We are a dedicated team of 35+ employees, known to be knowledge-intensive, competent, and respected in our field. We are characterized by solid technical skills, and an energetic and strong social working environment. Our commitment to provide the highest quality knowledge, experience, and both strategic and deep technical expertise is what allows us to create a SAFER and BETTER future together with our clients.

About the job: As our new Security Advisor, you will work independently with companies and organizations at a high professional and technical level.
You will have a high degree of freedom to influence your daily work and projects, and to influence the development of the company.
You will be part of a dynamic team of talented people with great passion for Cyber Security within Red Teaming, Blue Teaming, enterprise infrastructure/application hardening and cloud hardening.
Typical projects would be aiding and assisting customers in finding vulnerabilities and misconfigurations in their Azure, Microsoft 365 cloud environment, and Active Directory. This will be done through security assessment and internal penetration tests, with the mindset of an assume breach scenario. Furthermore, you will be a trusted advisor for the customers, which includes recommending the best and most secure solutions for their Microsoft cloud and enterprise infrastructure, whether it be infrastructure designs or security best practices according to industry standards, combined with your own knowledge. 
Signs of success:

You have a deep interest and passion for Cyber Security - especially from the defensive angle
You are passionate about creating the greatest possible value for customers, and you like to be professionally challenged in close sparring with customers and colleagues.
You thrive engaging and working closely with the customers, also on-site
As a type, you are energetic, dynamic, and outgoing. You like to take responsibility and you have a secure sense of quality in your work.
You are constantly seeking and exploring new knowledge in the field and are happy to share your knowledge with your colleagues. You are ambitious and want to be among the best in your field

Skills we can’t do without:

Full working proficiency in English and Danish
You have a valid driver's license and a clean criminal record
You have a solid understanding of the various Microsoft cloud services, including but not limited to: Azure AD, Office 365, Intune, and the security stack such as Microsoft Defender for Office 365 and Microsoft Defender for Endpoint. Practical experience of implementing and daily operation is a plus.
You have a solid understanding of Azure infrastructure and resources, such as but not limited to: Virtual Networks, Network Security Groups, Storage Accounts, Virtual Machines, and SQL Databases. 

Skills we’d like:

Familiarity with the Microsoft Cloud Adoption Framework and Enterprise Scale Landing Zones
Knowledge of the CIS Security Benchmarks for Microsoft 365 and Azure
Experience with implementing infrastructure in Azure
Experience with operating and administer Azure and Microsoft 365 services
You are familiar with endpoint management through Microsoft Endpoint Manager (Intune)
You are familiar with the principle of least privilege in Azure AD and in Azure Resource Manager


  More reasons to join us: Our culture is strong and unique, and we value a healthy and social work environment – you will work 37 hours/week. You will have a significant personal budget for training, courses, certifications, and/or conferences.
You will get to work with enterprise clients on interesting projects together with your awesome technical colleagues and have the opportunity to explore and develop your interests in weekly Nerd Club meetings after hours, or monthly Nerd Days during office hours. 

Curious to know more? If you have questions to the position, feel free to contact contact Thomas Wong; (+45) 9310 6032

Application Send your motivated application with resume and diplomas in .pdf-format to info@improsec.com. We take in candidates for interviews on a running basis. As we work with cyber security, it is a requirement that you can show, and uphold a clean criminal record.

Vores sundhedspolitik går også igen i den kantineordning, som vi tilbyder ansatte. Vi har tilknyttet vores eget kokketeam, som hver dag laver lækre sunde retter. Herudover tilbyder vi en række øvrige personalegoder, såsom massage, betalt telefon, arbejdstøj samt en gunstig pensionsordning og sundhedsforsikring. 






Ansøgningsfrist:
 Snarest muligt 
  

Arbejdssted: København S

Erfaren .NET udvikler til Copenhagen Software
Sætter du en ære i at udvikle god kode, og brænder du for at blive ved med at udvikle dit talent – så skal du læse videre…
Vi søger en senior .NET udvikler til vores stadig voksende kunde- og projektportefølje, og har brug for dig, som i samarbejde med resten af vores dygtige team fortsat kan sikre høj kvalitet i vores leverancer.
Copenhagen Software er et udviklingshus og vores kerneydelser er centreret omkring API’er, integrationer og Azure. Vores dedikerede mål er at nedbryde barrierer mellem forretning og IT. Vi går på arbejde hver morgen for at bringe IT og forretning tættere sammen.
Vores kultur bygger på vores passion for udvikling. Vi tænker udvikling som en disciplin og et fag. Når vi udvikler, er vores fokus på at skabe en god software, som kan holde i 10-20 år. Vi ”nørder” både artikler fra 70’erne og afprøver fremtidige teknologier.
Fælles for dette er, at vi altid forsøger at blive endnu bedre, både når det gælder teknologi, udvikling, og vores egne kompetencer.
Alle i Copenhagen Software – medarbejdere som ledere - kan programmere, og derfor taler vi samme sprog.
Om jobbet 
Som .NET udvikler hos os vil din hverdag være præget af mange forskellige opgaver. Vi har store som små udviklingsopgaver for vores kunder. Opgaverne kan være alt imellem udvikling og design af helt nye systemer til optimering og kvalitetssikring af eksisterende it-systemer.
Vi forestiller os, at du har flg. faglige kvalifikationer:

+5 års erfaring med softwareudvikling
Erfaring med .NET udvikling
Erfaring med C#
Kendskab til F#
Generel god teknisk forståelse og indsigt

Du bliver en del af et team, hvor vi hjælper hinanden med vidensdeling og godt kollegaskab. Vi forestiller os derfor, at du har flg. personlige kvalifikationer:

Struktureret
Vedholdende
Højt drive
Go do attitude
God til at lytte og kommunikere
Tillidsvækkende og troværdig
En service- og forretningsorienteret tilgang

Vi tilbyder:

Et spændende og afvekslende job med høj grad af frihed
Godt arbejdsmiljø i en organisation som er præget af høj faglighed og medarbejdertilfredshed
Muligheder for selv at påvirke din egen udvikling
Attraktiv lønpakke
At du bliver del af et ambitiøst konsulenthus med en flad organisation samt et stærkt fagligt og socialt miljø, hvor der er plads til initiativ samt faglig og personlig udvikling.

Hvis du synes ovennævnte lyder spændende, så skynd dig at sende os en ansøgning - vi venter på dig!
Ansøgningsfrist: Vi indkalder til samtaler løbende. Alle henvendelser behandles fortroligt.
Opstart snarest muligt.
Yderligere informationer og ansøgning Har du spørgsmål til stillingen, er du velkommen til at kontakte:
Rune Ibsen, COO, Senior Architect, +45 27288285
Du kan læse mere om os på www.copenhagensoftware.com
Copenhagen Software er en del af itm8. itm8 er en førende dansk leverandør af IT-services til den private og offentlige sektor. Vi er repræsenteret på en række lokationer i Danmark, Sverige, Filippinerne og Tjekkiet. Koncernen har en stærk markedsposition i Danmark inden for fire forretningsområder; Cloud Services, Digital Solutions, Professional Services og Cyber Security Services. Ligeledes beskæftiger koncernen mere end 1.100 medarbejdere med aktiviteter i 10 individuelle og unikke virksomheder, der alle fokuserer på samarbejde, innovation, udvikling og værdiskabelse på tværs af porteføljen. De 10 virksomheder er IT Relation, Mentor IT, Sotea, Improsec, Miracle42, Emineo, Copenhagen Software, Progressive, Itadel og Cloud Teams.



CONTACT US

COMPANY: COPENHAGEN SOFTWARE
LOCATION: KØBENHAVN Ø - VIBY J 
APPLY BEFORE: AS SOON AS POSSIBLE

Tænder du på ord som Java EE, mailkryptering og certifikatbaseret infrastruktur? Kunne du tænke dig at være med til at udvikle på SEPO, Danmarks største Sikker Mail-løsning?
Kan du træde til med fejlsøgning og teknisk indsigt sammen med vores supportere, når opgaven bliver langhåret?
Kan du både fordybe dig teknisk og hjælpe kunden? Og bliver du motiveret af at hjælpe, hvor andre giver op? Så har vi stillingen til dig!
Vi søger en backend-udvikler, der har erfaring med Java eller mod på at mestre det.
Dine arbejdsopgaver vil blandt andet bestå af:

Vedligehold og udvikling af Sikker Mail-system
Certifikatbaseret kryptering
Webservices
Samarbejde med 2nd-level supportafdeling
Fejlsøgning i egne og kundernes systemer

Som person har du følgende kvalifikationer:

Du finder glæde i at give dig i kast med nye opgaver og teknologier.
Du kan sætte dig ind i komplekse problemstillinger og har evnen til både at ny-udvikle og vedligeholde ældre koder.
Du er interesseret i sikkerhed og kender til OWASP.
Du motiveres i høj grad af at arbejde selvstændigt og med frihed under ansvar.
Du sætter pris på humor, en uformel tone, og du er hjælpsom, løsningsorienteret og pålidelig.

Hvem er vi:
SEPO er en gennemprøvet og stabil Sikker Mail-løsning, som servicerer mere end 300 kunder, som inkluderer alle regionerne, de fleste kommuner og en stor del af ministerierne. SEPO benyttes også i landets største banker og i private virksomheder. SEPO integrerer med den offentlige Digital Post-løsning mellem offentlige instanser og borger/virksomheder.
SEPO leveres enten som en hosted service eller implementeres i kundens egen infrastruktur.
Hos me’ning hjælper vi virksomheder med at give digitalisering mening. Vi tror på, at digitale løsninger giver bedst mening, hvis folk forstår, hvorfor og hvordan de skal bruge dem. Vi kalder det: ”Digital Solutions That Make Sense”. Derfor bygger vi ikke bare digitale produkter og løsninger – vi integrerer menneskelig forståelse og brugerinddragelse i vores projekter, så det passer til virksomheden og til dem, der skal bruge teknologien. Det er vores tilgang. Her tror vi nemlig på mennesker før teknologi.
Vi er et sammentømret team, hvor humøret er højt, stemningen er afslappet, og der er plads til alle typer.

Du tilbydes:
Du tilbydes et job i en virksomhed i vækst, der anerkender, at det er dig, der er med til at flytte virksomheden. Du vil blive en del af en virksomhed, hvor alt er muligt, og som prioriterer en fleksibel dagligdag. Har du store ambitioner, har du ligeledes gode muligheder for at tilegne dig et større ansvar og vokse i vores virksomhed. Vi prioriterer kontinuerlig uddannelse inden for relevante IT-områder, som du finder interessant.
Herudover tilbydes du en attraktiv og konkurrencedygtig lønpakke, pension, internet, mobil, kantineordning samt en aktiv personaleforening.
Dit arbejdssted bliver på vores kontor i Aarhus.
Der vil forud for ansættelse blive indhentet straffeattest. Du skal kunne sikkerhedsgodkendes af PET på niveau Hemmeligt (HEM).
Du opfordres til at søge hurtigst muligt, da vi løbende indkalder egnede kandidater til samtale.
Vil du vide mere, så ring til Talent Acquisition Researcher Søren Prehnum på 61200556.

We are looking for new colleagues for the role of Implementation specialist. The experience with transition and migration of Microsoft systems is required. You are the person who we are looking for in case you do not give up, when you do not know a technology in depth, as you see the opportunity to learn. In order to be successful in the role, you need to be used to communicating with customers and appear serious, trustworthy by keeping the promises in delivery. We believe that the personal qualities come first, and that the technical competencies naturally follow. Let’s join open and friendly environment of a Danish company!
About the Job

    You will be part of the Customer Transition department - Implementation and will be responsible for:
    

Successful transition of new and existent customers to IT Relation service platform 
You will be an active part of planning and coordinating of resources to make certain that services are effectively transitioned into service operation 
You will be taking responsibility for the alignment of IT with the wider business and embedding quality in all systems, processes, and documentation 
You will establish a stable and trustworthy environment with both customer, team, and colleagues, through direct and indirect dialog


Particular responsibilities of this job are:

Transition, migration and implementation of customers services within project scope
Act as technical lead in projects and attend on agreed meetings once you gain the necessary seniority
Follow our procedure, instructions, guidelines and service when delivering a solution
Secure a stable work environment, for both customer and colleagues
Seek solutions and be resourceful in delivering demanding tasks
Document and review customer's services
Create and review process and guides
Attend internal development interview with manager and department meetings
Keep up to date on new technologies and personal development
Deliver high integrity and with our ‘Close to customers” attitude.


 What do you bring?




Ideally you have 3-5 years of previous experience in working with transition and migration of Microsoft systems
Fluency in English, both written and spoken
Excellent personal knowledge, communication, and organizational skills
Experience and understanding of basic infrastructure like DNS, DHCP, AD, GPO, Windows server etc.
Knowledge about Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Azure
Commercial / Business mindsets for efficiency and success
Responsible and structured work ethic
Relevant Microsoft Certification already required or ready to obtain



 Employee Benefits

5 weeks of holidays 
5 sick days/year 
Flexible working hours 
Hybrid working model 
iPhone and Lenovo laptop 
Cafeteria flexible spending account (18.000 CZK/year) 
Meal vouchers in amount of 100 CZK/voucher (55 CZK is covered by employer) 
Monthly pension insurance of 3% 
Possibility to arrange a Multisport card (as a part of Cafeteria)
Company assistance towards TAX authorities 
Czech, English and Danish lessons paid by company
Support in your professional and personal growth 
Socializing events (company parties, team events, Friday's breakfast...) 
Fresh fruits and vegetables, delicious coffee and tea and soft drinks 
Height adjustable tables 
Pool table, darts, PlayStation 4 Pro and relax zone 


We are looking forward your application!
